questions.question: Can you step back and define anthropomorphism, how you see it in general terms in your work?
Do you think it's possible to have a long-term committed monogamous relationship with a robot?
So what do you think it takes to build a system that exhibits greater and greater levels of intelligence?
So yeah, so how hard is it to pass a Turing test, in your view?
Like, should we emotionally manipulate you into having a deep connection with Alexa or not?
What are your thoughts in general on intellectual property in this weird age of software, AI, robotics?
So, what do you see as the future of personal robotics, social robotics, interaction with other robots?
